creator: 1983-01-06@gmx.net
text:
VirtualWebappLoader's JavaDocs for Tomcat 6 say:

"This is not meant to be used for production. Its meant to ease development with IDE's without the need for fully republishing jars in WEB-INF/lib" 

Since this limitation is not given anymore and has been removed from Tomcat 7 JavaDocs, one should remove this erroneous warning from version 6 too.

See this reference too: http://www.mail-archive.com/users@tomcat.apache.org/msg107848.html

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the report. This has been fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.38 onwards.
